attributes.action: To be able to submit footage of drivers on their phones whilst at the wheel.
attributes.background:
As a motorcyclist with an action camera on every single commute without fail, I see drivers using their mobile phones whilst driving whether it is in stationary or moving traffic. 
I am calling for motorcyclists / By passers to use their camera footage to use as evidence to help with a conviction.

rejection.details: Any decision to accept video evidence as part of a prosecution case would be the responsibility of the police and the courts, which are independent of the Government and Parliament.
